metadata.synopsis: Patron Thimble, dialogue at Elfsong Tavern. Speaks about Gortash' propaganda.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_Elfsong_Patron_004 at Elfsong Tavern.

0.speaker: Thimble
0.text: Remember when we could just go down to the tavern and enjoy a few hands of cards? Now, all we do is worry.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Thimble
1.text: As far as I'm concerned, Lord Gortash gets the benefit of the doubt. Until he does something obviously wrong, he's got my support. We can't afford to be squabbling with the Absolute crawling up our arses.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute
